column1: Little Goat Diner////The conversation and chatter in the restaurant was palpable - great atmosphere.  The menu had some great stuff
column2: including a Cuban sandwich blue-plate special that my daughter ordered
column3: but I ordered the pork sandwich.  For some strange reason
column4: I got the "blue plate" (it said so
column6: instead of her.  We exchanged samples of each other's sandwich fillings
